publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2335 Karen Whitefield: Lanarkshire Success in Hosting the 2011 International Children’s Games—That the Parliament congratulates North and South Lanarkshire and all members of the New Lanarkshire Limited bid team on their recent success in bidding to host the 2011 International Children’s Games; notes that this is the first time that a county rather than a city has been chosen to host the games; looks forward to welcoming the 1,760 participants who will take part in 10 sports; recognises the long-term benefits that can accrue in improving health by becoming involved in sporting activities; also recognises the benefits to young people from meeting people from diverse cultures, and wishes everyone concerned in hosting the games every success in planning for this important event.
S3M-2335 Lanarkshire Success in Hosting the 2011 International Children’s Games (lodged on 16 July 2008) Jack McConnell*
S3M-2335 Lanarkshire Success in Hosting the 2011 International Children’s Games (lodged on 16 July 2008) Jamie Hepburn*
